aiFutureSection.title: Preparing students for an AI-driven future

missionBlock.missionText: Make high-quality tech education accessible in Kyrgyzstan and beyond, and connect graduates to real roles.
missionBlock.description: We blend practical projects, mentorship, and AI-assisted learning to help beginners become job-ready. Our programs are bilingual (KG/RU) with English support and a strong focus on real outcomes.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.text: We run cohort-based programs in Frontend, Backend (Django), Flutter, and UX/UI. Students learn by building, get weekly feedback, and graduate with career assets.

verticalBlocks.title: AI-Assisted Learning
verticalBlocks.text: Personalized guidance, signals, and instant feedback.

verticalBlocks.title: Career Support
verticalBlocks.text: Resume, LinkedIn, mock interviews, salary negotiation.
